content:
"Ah, so this is where you were taking me," Raemon remarks as you begin to climb the steps to A Hearty Brew. You tell Raemon that it's about time he took a well-earned break. Work is important, but our bodies and minds need time to rest and recuperate, too. He nods along, rolling his eyes but smiling despite himself. "I know, I know. You're right—a wisdom older than the Elders themselves. Well, lead the way, then!"

You get a round of drinks and sit together in the open courtyard. A talespinner sits in a nearby corner, strumming a quiet tune on his lute. Raemon leans back in his chair, takes a few sips of honey mead, and breathes a sigh of relief. "I have to admit, I needed this. Thank you for taking the time to bring me here. I appreciate it."

He raises his flagon and you clink yours against it. "To the Rangers," he says. You make a toast of your own, and together you sit in silence while the worries of the day float away like leaves in the autumn breeze.

Discard Raemon and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue. Record SHARED A DRINK on the campaign tracker.
